passive.name: VORACITY
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) VORACITY
                                Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her remaining ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.Katarina slashes at all nearby enemies whenever she picks up a Dagger, dealing 40 magic damage (40 (+15 ) + 100% bonus  + 30% (+4.5% ) ).

q.name: (Q) BOUNCING BLADE
q.description:
(Q) BOUNCING BLADE
 10/9/8/7s  
                                
                                
                                Throws a Dagger, dealing 75 magic damage (75/115/155/195 + 30%Â ) to the target and 2 nearby enemies. The dagger then ricochets to the ground behind the initial strike point.The Dagger's time in the air is the same regardless of how many times it bounces.

w.name: (W) PREPARATION
w.description:
(W) PREPARATION
 14/13/12/11s  
                                
                                
                                Tosses a Dagger in the air and hastes Katarina by 50/60/70/80%.

e.name: (E) SHUNPO
e.description:
(E) SHUNPO
 14/12/10/8s  
                                
                                
                                Blink to a location near a Dagger or unit, dealing 49 magic damage (20/50/80/110 + 50%  + 30% ) to the nearest enemy.Picking up a Dagger greatly reduces the Cooldown of Shunpo.Range: 6

r.name: (R) DEATH LOTUS
r.description:
(R) DEATH LOTUS
 60/50/40s  
                                
                                
                                Rapidly throws blades at the 3 nearest enemy champions, dealing 400 magic damage (400/600/800 + 260% bonus  + 290% ) and applying Grievous Wounds. Katarina can move and throw blades for up to 2.6 seconds.Grievous Wounds reduces the effect of Healing and Regeneration effects on 50%.While cast, Katarina's base movement speed is reduced to 125.
